author: Margaret Mead
quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has.

author: Ban Ki-moon
quote: Saving our planet, lifting people out of poverty, advancing economic growth... these are one and the same fight. We must connect the dots between climate change, water scarcity, energy shortages, global health, food security and women's empowerment. Solutions to one problem must be solutions for all.

author: Richard Rogers
quote: The only way forward, if we are going to improve the quality of the environment, is to get everybody involved.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: The environment is everything that isn't me.

author: Dennis Weaver
quote: We don't have to sacrifice a strong economy for a healthy environment.

author: Elon Musk
quote: We're running the most dangerous experiment in history right now, which is to see how much carbon dioxide the atmosphere... can handle before there is an environmental catastrophe.

author: Evo Morales
quote: Sooner or later, we will have to recognise that the Earth has rights, too, to live without pollution. What mankind must know is that human beings cannot live without Mother Earth, but the planet can live without humans.

author: Barry Commoner
quote: Environmental pollution is an incurable disease. It can only be prevented.

author: Jacques Yves Cousteau
quote: Water and air, the two essential fluids on which all life depends, have become global garbage cans.

author: John Muir
quote: Keep close to Nature's heart... and break clear away, once in awhile, and climb a mountain or spend a week in the woods. Wash your spirit clean.

author: Chief Seattle
quote: The Earth does not belong to us: we belong to the Earth.

author: Bill Gates
quote: Climate change is a terrible problem, and it absolutely needs to be solved. It deserves to be a huge priority.

author: Sidney Sheldon
quote: Try to leave the Earth a better place than when you arrived.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: Thank God men cannot fly, and lay waste the sky as well as the earth.

author: Bill Nye
quote: Climate change is happening, humans are causing it, and I think this is perhaps the most serious environmental issue facing us.

author: Mike Huckabee
quote: The most important thing about global warming is this. Whether humans are responsible for the bulk of climate change is going to be left to the scientists, but it's all of our responsibility to leave this planet in better shape for the future generations than we found it.

author: Carlos Ghosn
quote: The time is right for electric cars - in fact the time is critical.

author: E. O. Wilson
quote: If all mankind were to disappear, the world would regenerate back to the rich state of equilibrium that existed ten thousand years ago. If insects were to vanish, the environment would collapse into chaos.

author: Bob Brown
quote: The future will either be green or not at all.

author: Kurt Vonnegut
quote: We could have saved the Earth but we were too damned cheap.

author: Unknown
quote: A true conservationist is a man who knows that the world is not given by his fathers, but borrowed from his children.

author: Annie Dillard
quote: There is a muscular energy in sunlight corresponding to the spiritual energy of wind.

author: Stewart Udall
quote: Plans to protect air and water, wilderness and wildlife are in fact plans to protect man.

author: Alex Trebek
quote: If you can't be in awe of Mother Nature, there's something wrong with you.

author: Leonardo DiCaprio
quote: Raising awareness on the most pressing environmental issues of our time is more important than ever.

author: Aeschylus
quote: By polluting clear water with slime you will never find good drinking water.

author: Ansel Adams
quote: It is horrifying that we have to fight our own government to save the environment.

author: Aldo Leopold
quote: Conservation is a state of harmony between men and land.

author: William Inge
quote: We have enslaved the rest of the animal creation, and have treated our distant cousins in fur and feathers so badly that beyond doubt, if they were able to formulate a religion, they would depict the Devil in human form.

author: Yoko Ono
quote: Every drop in the ocean counts.

author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
quote: I did not become a vegetarian for my health, I did it for the health of the chickens.

author: O. Henry
quote: We may achieve climate, but weather is thrust upon us.

author: Michael C. Burgess
quote: Nuclear power will help provide the electricity that our growing economy needs without increasing emissions. This is truly an environmentally responsible source of energy.

author: Sitting Bull
quote: They claim this mother of ours, the Earth, for their own use, and fence their neighbors away from her, and deface her with their buildings and their refuse.

author: Roger Tory Peterson
quote: Birds are indicators of the environment. If they are in trouble, we know we'll soon be in trouble.

author: Anna Freud
quote: We are aware only of the empty space in the forest, which only yesterday was filled with trees.

author: Lindsey Graham
quote: The sooner we get started with alternative energy sources and recognize that fossil fuels makes us less secure as a nation, and more dangerous as a planet, the better off we'll be.

author: Paul Hawken
quote: All is connected... no one thing can change by itself.

author: James Lovelock
quote: Sadly, it's much easier to create a desert than a forest.

author: Peter Diamandis
quote: We live in a world bathed in 5,000 times more energy than we consume as a species in the year, in the form of solar energy. It's just not in usable form yet.

author: Tom Allen
quote: Energy conservation is the foundation of energy independence.

author: Wangari Maathai
quote: In a few decades, the relationship between the environment, resources and conflict may seem almost as obvious as the connection we see today between human rights, democracy and peace.

author: Jacob Bronowski
quote: You will die but the carbon will not; its career does not end with you. It will return to the soil, and there a plant may take it up again in time, sending it once more on a cycle of plant and animal life.

author: Christopher Dodd
quote: We learned that economic growth and environmental protection can and should go hand in hand.

author: Madeleine M. Kunin
quote: When all the world appears to be in a tumult, and nature itself is feeling the assault of climate change, the seasons retain their essential rhythm. Yes, fall gives us a premonition of winter, but then, winter, will be forced to relent, once again, to the new beginnings of soft greens, longer light, and the sweet air of spring.

author: Sylvia Earle
quote: Ten percent of the big fish still remain. There are still some blue whales. There are still some krill in Antarctica. There are a few oysters in Chesapeake Bay. Half the coral reefs are still in pretty good shape, a jeweled belt around the middle of the planet. There's still time, but not a lot, to turn things around.

author: Al Gore
quote: Our world faces a true planetary emergency. I know the phrase sounds shrill, and I know it's a challenge to the moral imagination.

author: Dan Lipinski
quote: Yet, despite our many advances, our environment is still threatened by a range of problems, including global climate change, energy dependence on unsustainable fossil fuels, and loss of biodiversity.

author: Brooke Burke
quote: I really believe in the environmental movement right now - it only takes a little effort to make a big difference.

author: Jim Clyburn
quote: Environmental policy must strike a balance between the earth's best interests and our citizen's pressing needs.

author: John Doerr
quote: Green-tech could be the largest economic opportunity of the 21st Century.

author: Elon Musk
quote: The reality is gas prices should be much more expensive then they are because we're not incorporating the true damage to the environment and the hidden costs of mining oil and transporting it to the U.S. Whenever you have an unpriced externality, you have a bit of a market failure, to the degree that eternality remains unpriced.

author: Joseph Wood Krutch
quote: If we do not permit the earth to produce beauty and joy, it will in the end not produce food, either.

author: Norm Dicks
quote: The Endangered Species Act is the strongest and most effective tool we have to repair the environmental harm that is causing a species to decline.

author: Peter Benchley
quote: Without the oceans there would be no life on Earth.

author: Pat Buckley
quote: I can find God in nature, in animals, in birds and the environment.

author: Freeman Dyson
quote: We have no reason to think that climate change is harmful if you look at the world as a whole. Most places, in fact, are better off being warmer than being colder. And historically, the really bad times for the environment and for people have been the cold periods rather than the warm periods.

author: Luther Burbank
quote: We must return to nature and nature's god.

author: Vaclav Klaus
quote: Nevertheless, there is another threat on the horizon. I see this threat in environmentalism which is becoming a new dominant ideology, if not a religion. Its main weapon is raising the alarm and predicting the human life endangering climate change based on man-made global warming.

author: Russel Honore
quote: People need to be cautious because anything built by man can be destroyed by Mother Nature.

author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
quote: The life of the dead is placed in the memory of the living.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: Some people die at 25 and aren't buried until 75.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.

author: Mark Twain
quote: The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.

author: George Eliot
quote: Our dead are never dead to us, until we have forgotten them.

author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
quote: If a man has not discovered something that he will die for, he isn't fit to live.

author: Ashley Montagu
quote: The idea is to die young as late as possible.

author: Napoleon Bonaparte
quote: Death is nothing, but to live defeated and inglorious is to die daily.

author: Tecumseh
quote: When your time comes to die, be not like those whose hearts are filled with fear of death, so that when their time comes they weep and pray for a little more time to live their lives over again in a different way. Sing your death song, and die like a hero going home.

author: David Gerrold
quote: Life is hard. Then you die. Then they throw dirt in your face. Then the worms eat you. Be grateful it happens in that order.

author: Albert Pike
quote: What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us; what we have done for others and the world remains and is immortal.

author: Unknown
quote: Everybody wants to go to heaven, but nobody wants to die.

author: William Shakespeare
quote: Cowards die many times before their deaths; the valiant never taste of death but once.

author: Thomas Babington Macaulay
quote: And how can man die better than facing fearful odds, for the ashes of his fathers, and the temples of his Gods?

author: Lois McMaster Bujold
quote: The dead cannot cry out for justice. It is a duty of the living to do so for them.

author: Corazon Aquino
quote: I would rather die a meaningful death than to live a meaningless life.

author: Edvard Munch
quote: From my rotting body, flowers shall grow and I am in them and that is eternity.

author: Groucho Marx
quote: I intend to live forever, or die trying.

author: Horace Mann
quote: Be ashamed to die until you have won some victory for humanity.

author: Woody Allen
quote: I am not afraid of death, I just don't want to be there when it happens.

author: Georges Bernanos
quote: Hell, madam, is to love no longer.

author: Bill Maher
quote: Suicide is man's way of telling God, 'You can't fire me - I quit.'

author: Winston Churchill
quote: I am prepared to meet my Maker. Whether my Maker is prepared for the great ordeal of meeting me is another matter.

author: J. Robert Oppenheimer
quote: I am become death, the destroyer of worlds.

author: Brian Clough
quote: Don't send me flowers when I'm dead. If you like me, send them while I'm alive.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Death is no more than passing from one room into another. But there's a difference for me, you know. Because in that other room I shall be able to see.

author: Clarence Darrow
quote: I have never killed a man, but I have read many obituaries with great pleasure.

author: Warren Zevon
quote: I'll sleep when I'm dead.

author: Robert De Niro
quote: You'll have time to rest when you're dead.

author: Virginia Woolf
quote: Someone has to die in order that the rest of us should value life more.

author: Susan Ertz
quote: Millions long for immortality who don't know what to do with themselves on a rainy Sunday afternoon.

author: Edgar Allan Poe
quote: The boundaries which divide Life from Death are at best shadowy and vague. Who shall say where the one ends, and where the other begins?

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.

author: Mark Twain
quote: In the first place, God made idiots. That was for practice. Then he made school boards.

author: Abraham Lincoln
quote: The philosophy of the school room in one generation will be the philosophy of government in the next.

author: Aristotle
quote: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.

author: John Dewey
quote: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.

author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
quote: The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and to think critically. Intelligence plus character - that is the goal of true education.

author: Moliere
quote: We die only once, and for such a long time.

author: Henry Van Dyke
quote: Some people are so afraid to die that they never begin to live.

author: Sitting Bull
quote: If we must die, we die defending our rights.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

author: Colin Powell
quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.

author: Nicole Scherzinger
quote: I love a man with a great sense of humor and who is intelligent - a man who has a great smile. He has to make me laugh. I like a man who is very ambitious and driven and who has a good heart and makes me feel safe. I like a man who is very strong and independent and confident - that is very sexy - but at the same time, he's very kind to people.

author: William Butler Yeats
quote: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.

author: Anthony J. D'Angelo
quote: Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow.

author: Diogenes
quote: The foundation of every state is the education of its youth.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
quote: To educate a man in mind and not in morals is to educate a menace to society.

author: Chanakya
quote: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth.

author: Francis Bacon
quote: Men fear death as children fear to go in the dark; and as that natural fear in children is increased by tales, so is the other.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: If we lose love and self respect for each other, this is how we finally die.

author: Jean Cocteau
quote: Since the day of my birth, my death began its walk. It is walking toward me, without hurrying.

author: Mark Twain
quote: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.

author: Bethenny Frankel
quote: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.

author: Louis C. K.
quote: I don't stop eating when I'm full. The meal isn't over when I'm full. It's over when I hate myself.

author: Gene Tierney
quote: I followed the same diet for 20 years, eliminating starches, living on salads, lean meat, and small portions.

author: Linford Christie
quote: Adopting a new healthier lifestyle can involve changing diet to include more fresh fruit and vegetables as well as increasing levels of exercise.

author: Tom Colicchio
quote: This is what people don't understand: obesity is a symptom of poverty. It's not a lifestyle choice where people are just eating and not exercising. It's because kids - and this is the problem with school lunch right now - are getting sugar, fat, empty calories - lots of calories - but no nutrition.

author: Amber Heard
quote: You feel better when you're eating food that retains nutritional value.

author: Walt Disney
quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I don't have a girlfriend. But I do know a woman who'd be mad at me for saying that.

author: William Shakespeare
quote: Good night, good night! Parting is such sweet sorrow, that I shall say good night till it be morrow.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: Love is like a virus. It can happen to anybody at any time.

author: Wayne Dyer
quote: Real magic in relationships means an absence of judgment of others.

author: George Washington Carver
quote: Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom.

author: Maimonides
quote: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.

author: Allan Bloom
quote: Education is the movement from darkness to light.

author: James Thurber
quote: It is better to know some of the questions than all of the answers.

author: Herbert Spencer
quote: The great aim of education is not knowledge but action.

author: Conrad Hall
quote: You are always a student, never a master. You have to keep moving forward.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Education is an admirable thing, but it is well to remember from time to time that nothing that is worth knowing can be taught.

author: Robert Frost
quote: Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence.

author: Abigail Adams
quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and diligence.

author: Victor Hugo
quote: He who opens a school door, closes a prison.

author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
quote: Education is simply the soul of a society as it passes from one generation to another.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: My mother said I must always be intolerant of ignorance but understanding of illiteracy. That some people, unable to go to school, were more educated and more intelligent than college professors.

author: Carl Rogers
quote: The only person who is educated is the one who has learned how to learn and change.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
quote: Poor is the pupil who does not surpass his master.

author: Sydney J. Harris
quote: The whole purpose of education is to turn mirrors into windows.

author: E. W. Howe
quote: Some men are alive simply because it is against the law to kill them.

author: Maureen O'Hara
quote: John Candy knew he was going to die. He told me on his 40th birthday. He said, well, Maureen, I'm on borrowed time.

author: Giovanni Falcone
quote: He who doesn't fear death dies only once.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: When one has not had a good father, one must create one.

author: William Wordsworth
quote: The child is father of the man.

author: Frank A. Clark
quote: A father is a man who expects his son to be as good a man as he meant to be.

author: Beau Bridges
quote: My father was my teacher. But most importantly he was a great dad.

author: Frank Butler
quote: When I was 18, I thought my father was pretty dumb. After a while when I got to be 21, I was amazed to find out how much he'd learned in three years.

author: Joan Rivers
quote: Diets, like clothes, should be tailored to you.

author: Orson Welles
quote: My doctor told me to stop having intimate dinners for four. Unless there are three other people.

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: We never repent of having eaten too little.

author: Maimonides
quote: No disease that can be treated by diet should be treated with any other means.

author: Drew Carey
quote: The easiest diet is, you know, eat vegetables, eat fresh food. Just a really sensible healthy diet like you read about all the time.

author: Mireille Guiliano
quote: Once you have to start counting calories, it takes away from the joy of eating.

author: Jesse Owens
quote: We all have dreams. But in order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self-discipline, and effort.

author: James Dean
quote: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.

author: T. E. Lawrence
quote: All men dream, but not equally. Those who dream by night in the dusty recesses of their minds, wake in the day to find that it was vanity: but the dreamers of the day are dangerous men, for they may act on their dreams with open eyes, to make them possible.

author: Carl Jung
quote: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.

author: Anatole France
quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.

author: Yoko Ono
quote: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.

author: Paul Valery
quote: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.

author: Tupac Shakur
quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: A dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world.

author: William Butler Yeats
quote: But I, being poor, have only my dreams; I have spread my dreams under your feet; Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.

author: Langston Hughes
quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.

author: Mike Tyson
quote: I'm a dreamer. I have to dream and reach for the stars, and if I miss a star then I grab a handful of clouds.

author: Vincent Van Gogh
quote: I dream of painting and then I paint my dream.

author: Janet Jackson
quote: Dreams can become a reality when we possess a vision that is characterized by the willingness to work hard, a desire for excellence, and a belief in our right and our responsiblity to be equal members of society.

author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery
quote: A designer knows he has achieved perfection not when there is nothing left to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.

author: Charles Eames
quote: The details are not the details. They make the design.

author: Walt Disney
quote: You can design and create, and build the most wonderful place in the world. But it takes people to make the dream a reality.

author: Jack Nicholson
quote: There's only two people in your life you should lie to... the police and your girlfriend.

author: Orson Welles
quote: If there hadn't been women we'd still be squatting in a cave eating raw meat, because we made civilization in order to impress our girlfriends.

author: Thomas Fuller
quote: Choose a wife rather by your ear than your eye.

author: Joey Adams
quote: Never let a fool kiss you, or a kiss fool you.

author: Clifford Stoll
quote: Data is not information, information is not knowledge, knowledge is not understanding, understanding is not wisdom.

author: Leo Buscaglia
quote: Change is the end result of all true learning.

author: Will Rogers
quote: Everybody is ignorant, only on different subjects.

author: Abu Bakr
quote: Cursed is the man who dies, but the evil done by him survives.

author: Annie Lennox
quote: Dying is easy, it's living that scares me to death.

author: Steven Wright
quote: When I die, I'm leaving my body to science fiction.

author: Erik Erikson
quote: Healthy children will not fear life if their elders have integrity enough not to fear death.

author: Dawn French
quote: It was my father who taught me to value myself. He told me that I was uncommonly beautiful and that I was the most precious thing in his life.

author: Harry S Truman
quote: My father was not a failure. After all, he was the father of a president of the United States.

author: Dolly Parton
quote: Every single diet I ever fell off of was because of potatoes and gravy of some sort.

author: Kelly Clarkson
quote: I love healthy stuff and junk an equal amount. Whatever I'm craving, I go for it. I'm never trying to lose weight - or gain it. I'm just being.

author: Mark Hyman
quote: Calories from protein affect your brain, your appetite control center, so you are more satiated and satisfied.

author: Mae West
quote: I never worry about diets. The only carrots that interest me are the number you get in a diamond.

author: Alexander Pope
quote: What some call health, if purchased by perpetual anxiety about diet, isn't much better than tedious disease.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I'm sick of following my dreams. I'm just going to ask them where they're goin', and hook up with them later.

author: Zhuangzi
quote: I dreamed I was a butterfly, flitting around in the sky; then I awoke. Now I wonder: Am I a man who dreamt of being a butterfly, or am I a butterfly dreaming that I am a man?

author: Carl Sandburg
quote: Nothing happens unless first we dream.

author: Edgar Allan Poe
quote: Deep into that darkness peering, long I stood there, wondering, fearing, doubting, dreaming dreams no mortal ever dared to dream before.

author: Edgar Cayce
quote: Dreams are today's answers to tomorrow's questions.

author: Joel Osteen
quote: Do all you can to make your dreams come true.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Sleep is the best meditation.

author: Sarah Ban Breathnach
quote: The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do.

author: Branch Rickey
quote: Luck is the residue of design.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.

author: Elon Musk
quote: Any product that needs a manual to work is broken.

author: Coco Chanel
quote: Fashion fades, only style remains the same.

author: Ralph Lauren
quote: I don't design clothes, I design dreams.

author: Le Corbusier
quote: Space and light and order. Those are the things that men need just as much as they need bread or a place to sleep.

author: Frank Lloyd Wright
quote: Space is the breath of art.

author: Herbert A. Simon
quote: Everyone designs who devises courses of action aimed at changing existing situations into preferred ones.

author: Christian Louboutin
quote: A shoe is not only a design, but it's a part of your body language, the way you walk. The way you're going to move is quite dictated by your shoes.

author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe
quote: A chair is a very difficult object. A skyscraper is almost easier. That is why Chippendale is famous.

author: Louis Kahn
quote: Design is not making beauty, beauty emerges from selection, affinities, integration, love.

author: Thomas J. Watson
quote: Design must reflect the practical and aesthetic in business but above all... good design must primarily serve people.

author: Kenzo Tange
quote: Designs of purely arbitrary nature cannot be expected to last long.

author: Alec Issigonis
quote: A camel is a horse designed by committee.

author: Issey Miyake
quote: Design is not for philosophy it's for life.

author: Dieter Rams
quote: Good design is making something intelligible and memorable. Great design is making something memorable and meaningful.

author: Scott Adams
quote: Nothing defines humans better than their willingness to do irrational things in the pursuit of phenomenally unlikely payoffs. This is the principle behind lotteries, dating, and religion.

author: Mae West
quote: Save a boyfriend for a rainy day - and another, in case it doesn't rain.

author: Billie Holiday
quote: A kiss that is never tasted, is forever and ever wasted.

author: William Butler Yeats
quote: Wine comes in at the mouth And love comes in at the eye; That's all we shall know for truth Before we grow old and die.

author: Honore de Balzac
quote: No man should marry until he has studied anatomy and dissected at least one woman.

author: Keanu Reeves
quote: Kissing someone is pretty intimate, actually very intimate, and your heart always kind of skips a beat before you do that.

author: Tim Allen
quote: Women are like cars: we all want a Ferrari, sometimes want a pickup truck, and end up with a station wagon.

author: Natalie Portman
quote: Smart women love smart men more than smart men love smart women.

author: Samuel Goldwyn
quote: A bachelor's life is no life for a single man.

author: Anne Hathaway
quote: Kindness is really important to me in finding my own prince - so are patience and a sense of humor. Without those qualities he's no Prince Charming!

author: Neil LaBute
quote: Relationships in general make people a bit nervous. It's about trust. Do I trust you enough to go there?

author: Garry Shandling
quote: I'm dating a woman now who, evidently, is unaware of it.

author: Foxy Brown
quote: To find a prince, you gotta kiss some toads.

author: Angelina Jolie
quote: I always play women I would date.

author: Soren Kierkegaard
quote: It seems essential, in relationships and all tasks, that we concentrate only on what is most significant and important.

author: Francesca Annis
quote: However successful you are, there is no substitute for a close relationship. We all need them.

author: William Congreve
quote: Courtship is to marriage, as a very witty prologue to a very dull play.

author: Christina Aguilera
quote: Right now I'm pretty single... My career is my boyfriend.

author: Edmund Burke
quote: To read without reflecting is like eating without digesting.

author: Walt Disney
quote: I would rather entertain and hope that people learned something than educate people and hope they were entertained.

author: Anatole France
quote: An education isn't how much you have committed to memory, or even how much you know. It's being able to differentiate between what you know and what you don't.

author: John F. Kennedy
quote: The goal of education is the advancement of knowledge and the dissemination of truth.

author: Robert M. Hutchins
quote: The object of education is to prepare the young to educate themselves throughout their lives.

author: Walt Whitman
quote: Let your soul stand cool and composed before a million universes.

author: Steven Adler
quote: Nothing is cooler and more attractive than a big comeback, and that'll be me.

author: George Fox
quote: Be still and cool in thine own mind and spirit.

author: Leonardo DiCaprio
quote: I'm not the kind of person who tries to be cool or trendy, I'm definitely an individual.

author: Kent Conrad
quote: Access to computers and the Internet has become a basic need for education in our society.

author: Barack Obama
quote: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.

author: Wayne Dyer
quote: If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.

author: Aeschylus
quote: Of all the gods only death does not desire gifts.

author: Thomas Browne
quote: Death is the cure for all diseases.

author: Marlene Dietrich
quote: When you're dead, you're dead. That's it.

author: William Penn
quote: For death is no more than a turning of us over from time to eternity.

author: Euripides
quote: No one can confidently say that he will still be living tomorrow.

author: Robert Green Ingersoll
quote: In the night of death, hope sees a star, and listening love can hear the rustle of a wing.

author: T. S. Eliot
quote: I had seen birth and death but had thought they were different.

author: Jimi Hendrix
quote: It's funny how most people love the dead, once you're dead, you're made for life.

author: Katharine Hepburn
quote: Death will be a great relief. No more interviews.

author: John Maynard Keynes
quote: In the long run we are all dead.

author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross
quote: It is not the end of the physical body that should worry us. Rather, our concern must be to live while we're alive - to release our inner selves from the spiritual death that comes with living behind a facade designed to conform to external definitions of who and what we are.

author: Frank Sinatra
quote: I'm gonna live till I die.

author: Jesus Christ
quote: And know that I am with you always; yes, to the end of time.

author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe
quote: God is in the details.

author: Francis of Assisi
quote: For it is in giving that we receive.

author: Pope Francis
quote: God never gives someone a gift they are not capable of receiving. If he gives us the gift of Christmas, it is because we all have the ability to understand and receive it.

author: Epictetus
quote: We have two ears and one mouth so that we can listen twice as much as we speak.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place.

author: Unknown
quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something.

author: Elon Musk
quote: I think it's very important to have a feedback loop, where you're constantly thinking about what you've done and how you could be doing it better. I think that's the single best piece of advice: constantly think about how you could be doing things better and questioning yourself.

author: Hugh Jackman
quote: When I come home, my daughter will run to the door and give me a big hug, and everything that's happened that day just melts away.

author: Pete Rose
quote: My father taught me that the only way you can make good at anything is to practice, and then practice some more.

author: Aldous Huxley
quote: Sons have always a rebellious wish to be disillusioned by that which charmed their fathers.

author: Vincent Van Gogh
quote: What would life be if we had no courage to attempt anything?

author: Benjamin Disraeli
quote: Courage is fire, and bullying is smoke.

author: T. S. Eliot
quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.

author: George S. Patton
quote: Courage is fear holding on a minute longer.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye.

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: In general, mankind, since the improvement of cookery, eats twice as much as nature requires.

author: Erma Bombeck
quote: A friend doesn't go on a diet because you are fat.

author: Robert H. Goddard
quote: It is difficult to say what is impossible, for the dream of yesterday is the hope of today and the reality of tomorrow.

author: Saint Augustine
quote: God loves each of us as if there were only one of us.

author: John Barrymore
quote: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.

author: Christopher Reeve
quote: So many of our dreams at first seem impossible, then they seem improbable, and then, when we summon the will, they soon become inevitable.

author: Michael Korda
quote: The more you can dream, the more you can do.

author: Ernest Hemingway
quote: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?

author: Eugene Ionesco
quote: Ideologies separate us. Dreams and anguish bring us together.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
quote: Why does the eye see a thing more clearly in dreams than the imagination when awake?

author: Gloria Steinem
quote: Without leaps of imagination, or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities. Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.

author: Steve Wozniak
quote: In the end, I hope there's a little note somewhere that says I designed a good computer.

author: Marc Newson
quote: I think it's really important to design things with a kind of personality.

author: Donna Karan
quote: Design is a constant challenge to balance comfort with luxe, the practical with the desirable.

author: Anselm Kiefer
quote: I believe in empty spaces; they're the most wonderful thing.

author: Herodotus
quote: Some men give up their designs when they have almost reached the goal; While others, on the contrary, obtain a victory by exerting, at the last moment, more vigorous efforts than ever before.

author: Robert Frost
quote: The artist in me cries out for design.

author: Jane Jacobs
quote: Design is people.

author: Gianni Versace
quote: I like the body. I like to design everything to do with the body.

author: Joe Rogan
quote: If you can lie, you can act, and if you can lie to crazy girlfriends, you can act under pressure.

author: Wendy Liebman
quote: I've been on so many blind dates, I should get a free dog.

author: William Camden
quote: The sea hath fish for every man.

author: Leonardo DiCaprio
quote: I've never been Romeo who meets a girl and falls for her immediately. It's been a much slower process for me each time I've gone into a relationship.

author: Britney Spears
quote: I don't understand the whole dating thing. I know right off the bat if I'm interested in someone, and I don't want them to waste their money on me and take me out to eat if I know I'm not interested in that person.

author: John Mayer
quote: I hate being the heartbreaker. Hate it. If I date somebody and it doesn't work out, it's another nightmare for me.

author: Jennifer Lopez
quote: If you kiss on the first date and it's not right, then there will be no second date. Sometimes it's better to hold out and not kiss for a long time. I am a strong believer in kissing being very intimate, and the minute you kiss, the floodgates open for everything else.

author: Wale
quote: I dated a lot, but I never really had anyone who was worthy of an anniversary. And most girlfriends never made it to a year, anyway.

author: Stacy Keibler
quote: A simple compliment goes a really long way - for a guy to just come over and say, 'You have great hair' or 'I really like your dress,' and then just smile and walk away. That's a great move, because he's sort of putting himself out there by doing that, but it won't lead to any embarrassment if the girl isn't interested.

author: Helen Rowland
quote: A bachelor never quite gets over the idea that he is a thing of beauty and a boy forever.

author: Andre Maurois
quote: In literature as in love, we are astonished at what is chosen by others.

author: Carrot Top
quote: It's weird, I never wish anything bad upon anybody, except two or three old girlfriends.

author: Jason Schwartzman
quote: I don't know the first real thing about the dating game. I don't know how to talk to a specific person and connect. I just think you have to go to person by person and do the best you can with people in general.

author: Norman Cousins
quote: A library is the delivery room for the birth of ideas, a place where history comes to life.

author: Malcolm Forbes
quote: Education's purpose is to replace an empty mind with an open one.

author: Plato
quote: The direction in which education starts a man will determine his future in life.

author: B. F. Skinner
quote: Education is what survives when what has been learned has been forgotten.

author: Daniel J. Boorstin
quote: Education is learning what you didn't even know you didn't know.

author: Malala Yousafzai
quote: All I want is an education, and I am afraid of no one.

author: Richard M. Nixon
quote: I can take it. The tougher it gets, the cooler I get.

author: Jay-Z
quote: I'm a mirror. If you're cool with me, I'm cool with you, and the exchange starts. What you see is what you reflect. If you don't like what you see, then you've done something. If I'm standoffish, that's because you are.

author: Kurt Cobain
quote: Rather be dead than cool.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Is a hippopotamus a hippopotamus, or just a really cool Opotamus?

author: Vanessa Hudgens
quote: Being cool is being your own self, not doing something that someone else is telling you to do.

author: John Ray
quote: Good words cool more than cold water.

author: Marc Newson
quote: To create well I have to be in a good mood, happy and cool.

author: Peabo Bryson
quote: I think you create your own hipness.

author: Deng Xiaoping
quote: Keep a cool head and maintain a low profile. Never take the lead - but aim to do something big.

author: Solomon Burke
quote: The secret was to just be cool, stay in God's graces, and work it out.

author: Joyce Meyer
quote: It's so important to realize that every time you get upset, it drains your emotional energy. Losing your cool makes you tired. Getting angry a lot messes with your health.

author: Celine Dion
quote: I've never been cool - and I don't care.

author: Ashley Olsen
quote: I don't think of myself as hot or cool or anything, just a dork.

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: Nothing gives one person so much advantage over another as to remain always cool and unruffled under all circumstances.

author: Dave Chappelle
quote: I'm cool with failing so long as I know that there are people around me that love me unconditionally.

author: Steve Wozniak
quote: Never trust a computer you can't throw out a window.

author: Noam Chomsky
quote: The internet could be a very positive step towards education, organisation and participation in a meaningful society.

author: Elon Musk
quote: Some people don't like change, but you need to embrace change if the alternative is disaster.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.

author: Frederick Douglass
quote: If there is no struggle, there is no progress.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.

author: Bertolt Brecht
quote: Do not fear death so much but rather the inadequate life.

author: Stewart Alsop
quote: A dying man needs to die, as a sleepy man needs to sleep, and there comes a time when it is wrong, as well as useless, to resist.

author: Charles Dudley Warner
quote: The excellence of a gift lies in its appropriateness rather than in its value.

author: George Carlin
quote: The main reason Santa is so jolly is because he knows where all the bad girls live.

author: Pindar
quote: Every gift which is given, even though it be small, is in reality great, if it is given with affection.

author: Charles Dickens
quote: I will honor Christmas in my heart, and try to keep it all the year.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: A good conscience is a continual Christmas.

author: Bob Hope
quote: If you haven't got any charity in your heart, you have the worst kind of heart trouble.

author: Yehuda Berg
quote: Words are singularly the most powerful force available to humanity. We can choose to use this force constructively with words of encouragement, or destructively using words of despair. Words have energy and power with the ability to help, to heal, to hinder, to hurt, to harm, to humiliate and to humble.

author: Harry S Truman
quote: If you can't convince them, confuse them.

author: Paul J. Meyer
quote: Communication - the human connection - is the key to personal and career success.

author: Mark Twain
quote: A man's character may be learned from the adjectives which he habitually uses in conversation.

author: Brian Tracy
quote: Communication is a skill that you can learn. It's like riding a bicycle or typing. If you're willing to work at it, you can rapidly improve the quality of evry part of your life.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Take advantage of every opportunity to practice your communication skills so that when important occasions arise, you will have the gift, the style, the sharpness, the clarity, and the emotions to affect other people.

author: Tony Robbins
quote: To effectively communicate, we must realize that we are all different in the way we perceive the world and use this understanding as a guide to our communication with others.

author: Evelyn Beatrice Hall
quote: I do not agree with what you have to say, but I'll defend to the death your right to say it.

author: Josiah Gilbert Holland
quote: The temple of art is built in words.

author: Rollo May
quote: Communication leads to community, that is, to understanding, intimacy and mutual valuing.

author: Robert Frost
quote: Half the world is composed of people who have something to say and can't, and the other half who have nothing to say and keep on saying it.

author: Peter Drucker
quote: The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn't said.

author: Buddha
quote: Whatever words we utter should be chosen with care for people will hear them and be influenced by them for good or ill.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: If you have an important point to make, don't try to be subtle or clever. Use a pile driver. Hit the point once. Then come back and hit it again. Then hit it a third time - a tremendous whack.

author: Eminem
quote: My father? I never knew him. Never even seen a picture of him.

author: Anais Nin
quote: I stopped loving my father a long time ago. What remained was the slavery to a pattern.

author: Pope John XXIII
quote: It is easier for a father to have children than for children to have a real father.

author: Spike Milligan
quote: My Father had a profound influence on me. He was a lunatic.

author: Gloria Swanson
quote: As Daddy said, life is 95 percent anticipation.

author: Shah Rukh Khan
quote: Whenever I fail as a father or husband... a toy and a diamond always works.

author: Halle Berry
quote: I know that I will never find my father in any other man who comes into my life, because it is a void in my life that can only be filled by him.

author: Kent Nerburn
quote: It is much easier to become a father than to be one.

author: Imelda Marcos
quote: I have never been a material girl. My father always told me never to love anything that cannot love you back.

author: Margaret Mead
quote: Fathers are biological necessities, but social accidents.

author: Fred Allen
quote: My father never raised his hand to any one of his children, except in self-defense.

author: August Strindberg
quote: That is the thankless position of the father in the family - the provider for all, and the enemy of all.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.

author: Jackie Gleason
quote: The second day of a diet is always easier than the first. By the second day you're off it.

author: Pope John Paul II
quote: Do not abandon yourselves to despair. We are the Easter people and hallelujah is our song.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: A man who was completely innocent, offered himself as a sacrifice for the good of others, including his enemies, and became the ransom of the world. It was a perfect act.

author: Billy Graham
quote: God proved His love on the Cross. When Christ hung, and bled, and died, it was God saying to the world, 'I love you.'

author: Charles Stanley
quote: There is only one secure foundation: a genuine, deep relationship with Jesus Christ, which will carry you through any and all turmoil. No matter what storms are raging all around, you'll stand firm if you stand on His love.

author: Dwight L. Moody
quote: We are told to let our light shine, and if it does, we won't need to tell anybody it does. Lighthouses don't fire cannons to call attention to their shining - they just shine.

author: Harvey Mackay
quote: When you have a dream that you can't let go of, trust your instincts and pursue it. But remember: Real dreams take work, They take patience, and sometimes they require you to dig down very deep. Be sure you're willing to do that.

author: Malcolm Forbes
quote: When you cease to dream you cease to live.

author: Oscar Hammerstein II
quote: You gotta have a dream. If you don't have a dream, how you gonna make a dream come true?

author: Eva Green
quote: I am a dreamer. Seriously, I'm living on another planet.

author: Joy Page
quote: Dream and give yourself permission to envision a You that you choose to be.

author: Milton Glaser
quote: To design is to communicate clearly by whatever means you can control or master.

author: Miguel de Cervantes
quote: Delay always breeds danger; and to protract a great design is often to ruin it.

author: William Butler Yeats
quote: Designs in connection with postage stamps and coinage may be described, I think, as the silent ambassadors on national taste.

author: Arne Jacobsen
quote: The primary factor is proportions.

author: Pierre Bonnard
quote: Color does not add a pleasant quality to design - it reinforces it.

author: Harry Bertoia
quote: The urge for good design is the same as the urge to go on living.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Design is a funny word. Some people think design means how it looks. But of course, if you dig deeper, it's really how it works.

author: James Randolph Adams
quote: Great designers seldom make great advertising men, because they get overcome by the beauty of the picture - and forget that merchandise must be sold.

author: Mike Davidson
quote: I don't start with a design objective, I start with a communication objective. I feel my project is successful if it communicates what it is supposed to communicate.

author: Charles Eames
quote: Eventually everything connects - people, ideas, objects. The quality of the connections is the key to quality per se.

author: Peter York
quote: Chandeliers are marvels of drop-dead showiness, the jewellery of architecture.

author: Harry Seidler
quote: Good design doesn't date.

author: Erma Bombeck
quote: Sometimes I can't figure designers out. It's as if they flunked human anatomy.

author: Christy Turlington
quote: Sacred spaces can be created in any environment.

author: Eva Longoria
quote: I'm a fabulous date, I make sure I look good, I like hearing what a guy has to say and I make sure the evening is a real laugh. I like to laugh.

author: Krysten Ritter
quote: I'm currently single, so I want to have fun! As for what guys need to do to date out of their league, it's all about the swagger. If you have confidence, you can get pretty much any girl.

author: Nora Ephron
quote: As far as the men who are running for president are concerned, they aren't even people I would date.

author: Jim Bishop
quote: Watching your daughter being collected by her date feels like handing over a million dollar Stradivarius to a gorilla.

author: Clark Gable
quote: It is an extra dividend when you like the girl you've fallen in love with.

author: Ben Kingsley
quote: If your best friend has stolen your girlfriend, it does become life and death.

author: Lucy Liu
quote: Everything I buy is vintage and smells funny. Maybe that's why I don't have a boyfriend.

author: Taylor Swift
quote: I'm not the girl who always has a boyfriend. I'm the girl who rarely has a boyfriend.

author: Beyonce Knowles
quote: When you really don't like a guy, they're all over you, and as soon as you act like you like them, they're no longer interested.

author: Joyce Brothers
quote: No matter how love-sick a woman is, she shouldn't take the first pill that comes along.

author: Stevie Nicks
quote: You know, the man of my dreams might walk round the corner tomorrow. I'm older and wiser and I think I'd make a great girlfriend. I live in the realm of romantic possibility.

author: Pink
quote: I change my mind so much I need two boyfriends and a girlfriend.

author: Robert Green Ingersoll
quote: It is a thousand times better to have common sense without education than to have education without common sense.

author: Francis Bacon
quote: If a man's wit be wandering, let him study the mathematics.

author: Alvin Toffler
quote: The illiterate of the future will not be the person who cannot read. It will be the person who does not know how to learn.

author: Desiderius Erasmus
quote: When I get a little money I buy books; and if any is left I buy food and clothes.

author: James Baldwin
quote: The paradox of education is precisely this - that as one begins to become conscious one begins to examine the society in which he is being educated.

author: Emma Goldman
quote: No one has yet realized the wealth of sympathy, the kindness and generosity hidden in the soul of a child. The effort of every true education should be to unlock that treasure.

author: Alexander Hamilton
quote: Learn to think continentally.

author: Will Durant
quote: Education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance.

author: Oscar Hammerstein II
quote: If you become a teacher, by your pupils you'll be taught.

author: Amos Bronson Alcott
quote: Observation more than books and experience more than persons, are the prime educators.

author: Horace Mann
quote: A human being is not attaining his full heights until he is educated.

author: Isaac Asimov
quote: Self-education is, I firmly believe, the only kind of education there is.

author: Gail Godwin
quote: Good teaching is one-fourth preparation and three-fourths pure theatre.

author: Alice Miller
quote: Learning is a result of listening, which in turn leads to even better listening and attentiveness to the other person. In other words, to learn from the child, we must have empathy, and empathy grows as we learn.

author: Ralph Ellison
quote: Education is all a matter of building bridges.

author: Galileo Galilei
quote: If I were again beginning my studies, I would follow the advice of Plato and start with mathematics.

author: Rufus Wainwright
quote: Being uncool is being pretty much the coolest you can be.

author: Gerard Way
quote: I want to be a vampire. They're the coolest monsters.

author: Kesha
quote: You don't have to carry a designer bag that costs more than a car to look cool.

author: Johnny Weir
quote: I suppose being fierce is a very good thing, and a very cool thing. But more than fierce, I think I'm a strong person and a strong individual. And that's what I take with me every day.

author: Norman Cousins
quote: He who keeps his cool best wins.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Computers themselves, and software yet to be developed, will revolutionize the way we learn.

author: Paul R. Ehrlich
quote: To err is human, but to really foul things up you need a computer.

author: Bill Gates
quote: I think it's fair to say that personal computers have become the most empowering tool we've ever created. They're tools of communication, they're tools of creativity, and they can be shaped by their user.

author: Dave Barry
quote: The Internet: transforming society and shaping the future through chat.

author: Isaac Asimov
quote: I do not fear computers. I fear the lack of them.

author: John F. Kennedy
quote: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.

author: Viktor E. Frankl
quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation - we are challenged to change ourselves.

author: Reinhold Niebuhr
quote: God grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change, the courage to change the things I can, and the wisdom to know the difference.

author: Heraclitus
quote: There is nothing permanent except change.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading.

author: Andy Warhol
quote: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.

author: Nathaniel Branden
quote: The first step toward change is awareness. The second step is acceptance.

author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.

author: Charles Kettering
quote: The world hates change, yet it is the only thing that has brought progress.

author: Alan Watts
quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.

author: Ellen Glasgow
quote: All change is not growth, as all movement is not forward.

author: Elie Wiesel
quote: Because of indifference, one dies before one actually dies.

author: Thomas S. Monson
quote: There is no better time than now, this very Christmas season, for all of us to rededicate ourselves to the principles taught by Jesus the Christ. It is the time to love the Lord, our God, with all our heart - and our neighbors as ourselves.

author: Gary Allan
quote: Let's be naughty and save Santa the trip.

author: Dr. Seuss
quote: Maybe Christmas, the Grinch thought, doesn't come from a store.

author: Edwin Louis Cole
quote: Expectancy is the atmosphere for miracles.

author: Henny Youngman
quote: I once wanted to become an atheist, but I gave up - they have no holidays.

author: Charles M. Schulz
quote: Christmas is doing a little something extra for someone.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: Truthful words are not beautiful; beautiful words are not truthful. Good words are not persuasive; persuasive words are not good.

author: John Wayne
quote: Talk low, talk slow and don't say too much.

author: Sydney J. Harris
quote: The two words 'information' and 'communication' are often used interchangeably, but they signify quite different things. Information is giving out; communication is getting through.

author: Samuel Beckett
quote: Words are all we have.

author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
quote: Words - so innocent and powerless as they are, as standing in a dictionary, how potent for good and evil they become in the hands of one who knows how to combine them.

author: Voltaire
quote: To hold a pen is to be at war.

author: Walt Disney
quote: Of all of our inventions for mass communication, pictures still speak the most universally understood language.

author: George Carlin
quote: By and large, language is a tool for concealing the truth.

author: Prince Charles
quote: Father told me that if I ever met a lady in a dress like yours, I must look her straight in the eyes.

author: Bertrand Russell
quote: The place of the father in the modern suburban family is a very small one, particularly if he plays golf.

author: Horace
quote: Undeservedly you will atone for the sins of your fathers.

author: Jean de La Fontaine
quote: It is impossible to please all the world and one's father.

author: Vincent Van Gogh
quote: I put my heart and my soul into my work, and have lost my mind in the process.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
quote: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.

author: Jonas Salk
quote: The reward for work well done is the opportunity to do more.

author: Thomas Fuller
quote: All things are difficult before they are easy.

author: Pope Paul VI
quote: All life demands struggle. Those who have everything given to them become lazy, selfish, and insensitive to the real values of life. The very striving and hard work that we so constantly try to avoid is the major building block in the person we are today.

author: Mark Twain
quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.

author: Thucydides
quote: The secret to happiness is freedom... And the secret to freedom is courage.

author: Dale Carnegie
quote: Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.

author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth
quote: My father always wanted to be the corpse at every funeral, the bride at every wedding and the baby at every christening.

author: Groucho Marx
quote: I was married by a judge. I should have asked for a jury.

author: Barbara De Angelis
quote: The real act of marriage takes place in the heart, not in the ballroom or church or synagogue. It's a choice you make - not just on your wedding day, but over and over again - and that choice is reflected in the way you treat your husband or wife.

author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness, of hatred, of jealousy, and, most easily of all, the gate of fear.

author: Anne Hathaway
quote: Weddings are important because they celebrate life and possibility.

author: Gustave Flaubert
quote: The heart, like the stomach, wants a varied diet.

author: Totie Fields
quote: I've been on a diet for two weeks and all I've lost is two weeks.

author: Ariana Grande
quote: Nothing burns more calories than dancing in 5-inch heels... try it!

author: Adele
quote: I like having my hair and face done, but I'm not going to lose weight because someone tells me to. I make music to be a musician not to be on the cover of Playboy.

author: Novak Djokovic
quote: My nutritionist has done a great job in changing my diet after we established I am allergic to things like gluten - I can't eat pizza, pasta and bread. I have lost some weight, but my movement is sharper and I feel great.

author: Giada De Laurentiis
quote: Pasta doesn't make you fat. How much pasta you eat makes you fat.

author: Salma Hayek
quote: If I go on a diet and work out, I'm always in a bad mood. I'd rather be a little heavier but nice.

author: Lady Gaga
quote: The dieting wars have got to stop.

author: Naomi Campbell
quote: I never diet. I smoke. I drink now and then. I never work out.

author: Vanessa Hudgens
quote: I don't go long without eating. I never starve myself: I grab a healthy snack.

author: Peace Pilgrim
quote: I don't eat junk foods and I don't think junk thoughts.

author: Lee Haney
quote: A systemic cleansing and detox is definitely the way to go after each holiday. It is the key to fighting high blood pressure, heart disease, cancer, and other health-related illnesses.

author: Hattie McDaniel
quote: As for those grapefruit and buttermilk diets, I'll take roast chicken and dumplings.

author: John Mortimer
quote: I refuse to spend my life worrying about what I eat. There is no pleasure worth forgoing just for an extra three years in the geriatric ward.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.

author: Archimedes
quote: Give me a lever long enough and a fulcrum on which to place it, and I shall move the world.

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head. If you talk to him in his language, that goes to his heart.

author: Napoleon Bonaparte
quote: Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see.

author: Jim Elliot
quote: He is no fool who gives what he cannot keep to gain what he cannot lose.

author: Lewis Carroll
quote: If you don't know where you are going, any road will get you there.

author: Swami Vivekananda
quote: We are what our thoughts have made us; so take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; they travel far.

author: Epictetus
quote: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.

author: Socrates
quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

author: Rick Warren
quote: The Bible tells us that Jesus Christ came to do three things. He came to have my past forgiven, you get a purpose for living and a home in Heaven.

author: William P. Young
quote: I really do believe that God is love, one of deep affection and grace and forgiveness and inspiration.

author: James E. Faust
quote: A rebirth out of spiritual adversity causes us to become new creatures.

author: Ravi Zacharias
quote: Outside of the cross of Jesus Christ, there is no hope in this world. That cross and resurrection at the core of the Gospel is the only hope for humanity. Wherever you go, ask God for wisdom on how to get that Gospel in, even in the toughest situations of life.

author: Janine di Giovanni
quote: Easter is meant to be a symbol of hope, renewal, and new life.

author: T. D. Jakes
quote: Here is the amazing thing about Easter; the Resurrection Sunday for Christians is this, that Christ in the dying moments on the cross gives us the greatest illustration of forgiveness possible.

author: William Barclay
quote: Love always involves responsibility, and love always involves sacrifice. And we do not really love Christ unless we are prepared to face His task and to take up His Cross.

author: Katharine Lee Bates
quote: It is the hour to rend thy chains, the blossom time of souls.

author: Bono
quote: But with Christ, we have access in a one-to-one relationship, for, as in the Old Testament, it was more one of worship and awe, a vertical relationship. The New Testament, on the other hand, we look across at a Jesus who looks familiar, horizontal. The combination is what makes the Cross.

author: Annie Besant
quote: 'Easter' is a movable event, calculated by the relative positions of sun and moon, an impossible way of fixing year by year the anniversary of a historical event, but a very natural and indeed inevitable way of calculating a solar festival. These changing dates do not point to the history of a man, but to the hero of a solar myth.

author: Deepak Chopra
quote: The symbolic language of the crucifixion is the death of the old paradigm; resurrection is a leap into a whole new way of thinking.

author: Ezra Taft Benson
quote: Faith in the Lord Jesus Christ is the foundation upon which sincere and meaningful repentance must be built. If we truly seek to put away sin, we must first look to Him who is the Author of our salvation.

author: Stefano Gabbana
quote: Dreams can still come true; you need a great deal of energy and determination, and a little bit of luck.

author: Roy Orbison
quote: I close my eyes, then I drift away, into the magic night I softly say. A silent prayer, like dreamers do, then I fall asleep to dream my dreams of you.

author: Aldous Huxley
quote: Dream in a pragmatic way.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: Youth is a wonderful thing. What a crime to waste it on children.

author: Jim Valvano
quote: Be a dreamer. If you don't know how to dream, you're dead.

author: Joseph Campbell
quote: Myths are public dreams, dreams are private myths.

author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
quote: Dreams are true while they last, and do we not live in dreams?

author: Anne Campbell
quote: You can plant a dream.

author: Erma Bombeck
quote: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.

author: Terry Pratchett
quote: Only in our dreams are we free. The rest of the time we need wages.

author: Douglas Adams
quote: He was a dreamer, a thinker, a speculative philosopher... or, as his wife would have it, an idiot.

author: Mary Shelley
quote: My dreams were all my own; I accounted for them to nobody; they were my refuge when annoyed - my dearest pleasure when free.

author: Grover Cleveland
quote: Sometimes I wake at night in the White House and rub my eyes and wonder if it is not all a dream.

author: Usher
quote: Strivers achieve what dreamers believe.

author: Mary Webb
quote: Saddle your dreams before you ride em.

author: Walter Scott
quote: To all, to each, a fair good-night, and pleasing dreams, and slumbers light.

author: D. H. Lawrence
quote: The world of men is dreaming, it has gone mad in its sleep, and a snake is strangling it, but it can't wake up.

author: Robert Evans
quote: Buildings designed with careful attention to aesthetics arouse and enlighten their occupants and that promotes their good health.

author: George Santayana
quote: Graphic design is the paradise of individuality, eccentricity, heresy, abnormality, hobbies and humors.

author: Anna Quindlen
quote: I would be most content if my children grew up to be the kind of people who think decorating consists mostly of building enough bookshelves.

author: Steve Ballmer
quote: Accessible design is good design.

author: Kristin Davis
quote: I also like men who like dogs. I couldn't date a man who doesn't like my dog.

author: Rita Rudner
quote: Whenever I date a guy, I think, 'Is this the man I want my children to spend their weekends with?'

author: Nicholas Haslam
quote: It's the fashion, I tell you: big, tall women going out with tiny, tiny men.

author: Justin Timberlake
quote: I have 20,000 girlfriends, all around the world.

author: Orlando Bloom
quote: I'm quite sensitive to women. I saw how my sister got treated by boyfriends. I read this thing that said when you are in a relationship with a woman, imagine how you would feel if you were her father. That's been my approach, for the most part.

author: Kim Cattrall
quote: Practically all the relationships I know are based on a foundation of lies and mutually accepted delusion.

author: Kesha
quote: All men that date me have to know that their name may end up in a pop song.

author: Joseph Addison
quote: What sculpture is to a block of marble, education is to the soul.

author: William Temple
quote: The most influential of all educational factors is the conversation in a child's home.

author: Usher
quote: I'm a flamboyant type of guy, a cooler version of Liberace.

author: Selena Gomez
quote: Being cool, having a 'cool' energy is just not attractive to me.

author: Jeremy London
quote: I don't need to hang out in a posse and try to act cool.

author: Robert Pattinson
quote: Sometimes just when I say hello the right way, I'm like, 'Whoa, I'm so cool.'

author: Michelle Obama
quote: I never cut class. I loved getting A's, I liked being smart. I liked being on time. I thought being smart is cooler than anything in the world.

author: Woodrow Wilson
quote: One cool judgment is worth a thousand hasty counsels. The thing to do is to supply light and not heat.

author: Elia Kazan
quote: Whatever hysteria exists is inflamed by mystery, suspicion and secrecy. Hard and exact facts will cool it.

author: Angelina Jolie
quote: All women do have a different sense of sexuality, or sense of fun, or sense of like what's sexy or cool or tough.

author: Mark Spitz
quote: I just tried to keep my cool and continue with my race plan: to win.

author: Bill Watterson
quote: It seems like once people grow up, they have no idea what's cool.

author: Paul Walker
quote: When I was younger, the pressure was just being cool. I never thought of myself as a cool guy. I always thought of myself as more of the goofy guy.

author: Janet Jackson
quote: Competition is great. And as long as it's friendly and not a malicious thing, then I think it's cool.

author: Kelly Clarkson
quote: I'm cute - and God I hate that. Because that's not cool. I'm like your niece, and nobody wants to date their niece. It's the chubby cheeks. The whole reason people voted for me on American Idol is because I'm an everyday, normal girl.

author: Emo Philips
quote: A computer once beat me at chess, but it was no match for me at kick boxing.

author: Joseph Campbell
quote: Computers are like Old Testament gods; lots of rules and no mercy.

author: Sydney J. Harris
quote: The real danger is not that computers will begin to think like men, but that men will begin to think like computers.

author: John F. Kennedy
quote: Man is still the most extraordinary computer of all.

author: Peter Drucker
quote: The new information technology... Internet and e-mail... have practically eliminated the physical costs of communications.

author: Ted Nelson
quote: The good news about computers is that they do what you tell them to do. The bad news is that they do what you tell them to do.

author: Edsger Dijkstra
quote: Computer science is no more about computers than astronomy is about telescopes.

author: Clifford Stoll
quote: Treat your password like your toothbrush. Don't let anybody else use it, and get a new one every six months.

author: Douglas Engelbart
quote: The digital revolution is far more significant than the invention of writing or even of printing.

author: Pablo Picasso
quote: Computers are useless. They can only give you answers.

author: Carl Rogers
quote: The curious paradox is that when I accept myself just as I am, then I can change.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: Things do not change; we change.

author: Carl Jung
quote: We cannot change anything until we accept it. Condemnation does not liberate, it oppresses.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: For the past 33 years, I have looked in the mirror every morning and asked myself: 'If today were the last day of my life, would I want to do what I am about to do today?' And whenever the answer has been 'No' for too many days in a row, I know I need to change something.

author: Calvin Coolidge
quote: Christmas is not a time nor a season, but a state of mind. To cherish peace and goodwill, to be plenteous in mercy, is to have the real spirit of Christmas.

author: Jay Leno
quote: The Supreme Court has ruled that they cannot have a nativity scene in Washington, D.C. This wasn't for any religious reasons. They couldn't find three wise men and a virgin.

author: Thomas Tusser
quote: At Christmas play and make good cheer, for Christmas comes but once a year.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Christmas is a season not only of rejoicing but of reflection.

author: Roy L. Smith
quote: He who has not Christmas in his heart will never find it under a tree.

author: Bing Crosby
quote: Unless we make Christmas an occasion to share our blessings, all the snow in Alaska won't make it 'white'.

author: Rudyard Kipling
quote: Words are, of course, the most powerful drug used by mankind.

author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
quote: Good communication is just as stimulating as black coffee, and just as hard to sleep after.

author: Philip K. Dick
quote: The basic tool for the manipulation of reality is the manipulation of words. If you can control the meaning of words, you can control the people who must use the words.

author: Horace
quote: The pen is the tongue of the mind.

author: Dick Clark
quote: Humor is always based on a modicum of truth. Have you ever heard a joke about a father-in-law?

author: Errol Flynn
quote: My father was never anti-anything in our house.

author: Miguel Indurain
quote: I inherited that calm from my father, who was a farmer. You sow, you wait for good or bad weather, you harvest, but working is something you always need to do.

author: Christie Hefner
quote: No, I never thought about my father's money as my money.

author: Cindy Crawford
quote: Watching your husband become a father is really sexy and wonderful.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it.

author: Samuel Goldwyn
quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.

author: Rumi
quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: Nothing will work unless you do.

author: W. Edwards Deming
quote: Quality is everyone's responsibility.

author: Plato
quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.

author: Gustave Flaubert
quote: Be regular and orderly in your life, so that you may be violent and original in your work.

author: Booker T. Washington
quote: Nothing ever comes to one, that is worth having, except as a result of hard work.

author: Sophocles
quote: Without labor nothing prospers.

author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
quote: Whatever your life's work is, do it well. A man should do his job so well that the living, the dead, and the unborn could do it no better.

author: Mark Zuckerberg
quote: The biggest risk is not taking any risk... In a world that is changing really quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: A woman is like a tea bag - you can't tell how strong she is until you put her in hot water.

author: Amelia Earhart
quote: Women, like men, should try to do the impossible. And when they fail, their failure should be a challenge to others.

author: Margaret Thatcher
quote: If you want something said, ask a man; if you want something done, ask a woman.

author: Ernest Hemingway
quote: There is no hunting like the hunting of man, and those who have hunted armed men long enough and liked it, never care for anything else thereafter.

author: Bertrand Russell
quote: War does not determine who is right - only who is left.

author: George S. Patton
quote: The object of war is not to die for your country but to make the other bastard die for his.

author: Norman Schwarzkopf
quote: The more you sweat in peace, the less you bleed in war.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: We shall defend our island, whatever the cost may be, we shall fight on the beaches, we shall fight on the landing grounds, we shall fight in the fields and in the streets, we shall fight in the hills; we shall never surrender.

author: George S. Patton
quote: It is foolish and wrong to mourn the men who died. Rather we should thank God that such men lived.

author: Alexander Hamilton
quote: There is a certain enthusiasm in liberty, that makes human nature rise above itself, in acts of bravery and heroism.

author: Arthur Ashe
quote: True heroism is remarkably sober, very undramatic. It is not the urge to surpass all others at whatever cost, but the urge to serve others at whatever cost.

author: Douglas MacArthur
quote: The soldier above all others prays for peace, for it is the soldier who must suffer and bear the deepest wounds and scars of war.

author: Charles Spurgeon
quote: The Lord gets his best soldiers out of the highlands of affliction.

author: Giuseppe Garibaldi
quote: I offer neither pay, nor quarters, nor food; I offer only hunger, thirst, forced marches, battles and death. Let him who loves his country with his heart, and not merely with his lips, follow me.

author: Thomas Merton
quote: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.

author: Rumi
quote: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.

author: John Keats
quote: Now a soft kiss - Aye, by that kiss, I vow an endless bliss.

author: A. A. Milne
quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.

author: Audre Lorde
quote: Each time you love, love as deeply as if it were forever.

author: Judy Garland
quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.

author: Blaise Pascal
quote: The heart has its reasons of which reason knows nothing.

author: Lord Byron
quote: Love will find a way through paths where wolves fear to prey.

author: William Shakespeare
quote: Doubt thou the stars are fire, Doubt that the sun doth move. Doubt truth to be a liar, But never doubt I love.

author: Muhammad Ali
quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.

author: Ray Bradbury
